report.title: App - Get NPMS Website Plots For User 2
report.description: List of plots of a given user ID. Used by Karolis to setup app. Report contains IDs hard-coded to live Warehouse. This version of the report contains extra attribute data not in the original report.
report.query: SELECT distinct #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=square.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id AND plot.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_attribute_id=118 AND lav.location_id=plot.id JOIN users u on u.id=#warehouse_user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pavOthers on pavOthers.int_value=square.id AND pavOthers.person_attribute_id=2 AND pavOthers.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=square.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=2 AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_expert_mode_attr_val on plot_expert_mode_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_expert_mode_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 122 AND plot_expert_mode_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val on plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 143 AND plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val on plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 144 AND plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_south_west_corner_attr_val on plot_elevation_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_elevation_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 146 AND plot_elevation_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_slope_attr_val on plot_slope_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_slope_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 31 AND plot_slope_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms plot_slope_ctt on plot_slope_ctt.id = plot_slope_attr_val.int_value AND plot_slope_ctt.termlist_id = 112 LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_direction_attr_val on plot_direction_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_direction_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 30 AND plot_direction_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms plot_direction_ctt on plot_direction_ctt.id = plot_direction_attr_val.int_value AND plot_direction_ctt.termlist_id = 113 WHERE square.location_type_id=4009 AND lw.website_id = 32 AND square.deleted=false AND pav.updated_by_id != u.id #filters# GROUP BY square.id,lav.text_value,plot.id,plot.created_by_id,pav.updated_by_id,u.id,cache_ttPlotType.term HAVING (plot.created_by_id=#warehouse_user_id# OR count(distinct pavOthers.id) < 2)

column.name: plot_name
column.sql: case when lav.text_value IS null then 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' else 'Plot ' || lav.text_value || ' at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' end

column.name: plot_expert_mode
column.sql: CASE WHEN plot_expert_mode_attr_val.int_value = 1 THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END
